name: LN_RFL_OTH_PYR_ID
description:
This table holds identifiers to identify the payor for which the referral numbers apply.





The LN_RFL_NUM and LN_RFL_OTH_PYR_ID tables are related to one another.  The number of lines in these tables will always be the same and values on the same line in each table will correspond to one another.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this contact.

columns.name: LN_RFL_OTH_PYR_ID
columns.description: This item holds the other payor identifier for the referral number on the line. The values in this item match the values in the OTH_PYR_ID column of the OTH_CVG_INFO table.
